about_the_game:
About this Music Pack


This is a collection of chiptune-style BGM, perfect for retro games.
A 1990s-era game music vibe has been painstakingly recreated using NES- and Fm radio-style sounds.
The pack includes not only powerful battle tracks, but a number of bittersweet slow-tempo tracks as well.

Creator: Don

Track List


Battle against the darkness
Battle against the overlord
Calm, smile, regret
Dream of one day
Empty mind
Fairy
Fallen
Fluttering grass
Fragile memories
Have we met before?
Hometown
Into abyss
Laura
Lost control
Malice
Maze
Our shop
Pray
Secret for two
Smoke
Sweet dream
Tale of tales
To the sky
Underground
detailed_description:
Terms of Use

  • This BGM can be used freely, regardless of whether the game in question is free or not.
  • This pack itself may also be freely copied and redistributed.
    However, the sale of individual materials in this pack is strictly forbidden.
  • The creator does not require credit.
  • These materials can be freely edited and modified.
  • The creator shall bear no responsibility whatsoever for any problems that may arise in accordance with the use of these materials.

name: Pixel Game Maker MV - Lo-bit Music Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 50 MB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: System supporting Pixel Game Maker MV

short_description: This is a collection of chiptune-style BGM, perfect for retro games. A 1990s-era game music vibe has been painstakingly recreated using NES- and Fm radio-style sounds. The pack includes not only powerful battle tracks, but a number of bittersweet slow-tempo tracks as well.
